ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 152
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye, I got a diamond from the plane of hate ... From: Brad Balatgek  To:  Sent: Friday, November 19, 1999 7:37 AM
ygData.messageBody:
Aye, I got a diamond from the plane of hate
----- Original Message -----
From: Brad Balatgek <gazamel@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, November 19, 1999 7:37 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 152


> From: Brad Balatgek <gazamel@...>
>
> Getting a diamond won't be easy. I think the only
> place you'll find them is on Dragons and in the
> Planes. I've looted jacinth up there, and sapphires,
> but have yet to find a diamond. Hate's coming up
> again soon though, so I'll have to get my toosh up
> there!
>
> Gazamel Prime
> Solusek Ro
> Dealers of Death
>
> --- Rathan Silvermyst <eqlegion@...> wrote:
> > Lungs are not trivial at skill 106. i am impressed
> > someone here made ONLY 10
> > Lungs and raised skill 3 times. that is quite
> > impressive. with an int of
> > 195, and after successfully crafting 17 Lungs, and
> > probably failing maybe 15
> > times...i have only raised skill 4 times.
> > my thoughts on dismond dust: the key lies in Rathe
> > Mtns...
> > Possibilities:
> > 1.) Take diamond to Ogre "gem crusher guy"
> > and he crushes
> > diamond-get dust back.
> > 2.) Take diamond to Gnome gem cutter guy,
> > have him cut the
> > diamond...and get dust back.
> > now all i need is a diamond and i'll give choice #2
> > a try.
> > -Ranth
> >
> <HR>
> <html>
> >
>
>
